typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Id as string,
		Provider_Type as string,
		NAME as string,
		GENDER as string,
		SPECIALITY as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		ZIP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'medstarrfpdatalakefs',
	folderPath: 'providers',
	fileName: 'providers.csv',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> providerSource
providerSource select(mapColumn(
		Id,
		Provider_Type,
		NAME,
		GENDER,
		SPECIALITY,
		ADDRESS,
		CITY,
		STATE,
		ZIP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Selecttest
Selecttest sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'Test',
	tableName: 'test',
	input(
		Id as string,
		Provider_Type as string,
		NAME as string,
		GENDER as string,
		SPECIALITY as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		ZIP as string
	)) ~> testSink
